sangan ya edija wartha athara, diguma jayag rahana anuk ramaya (oost reliyawa, 21), diguma parajaya labima anuk ramaya (bangladeshaya, 23), wadima pudgalika lakunu sankh yawa (rohith sharma, 264), hondama pandu yawime satahana (chaminda was, 8-19), oowarayak thula wadima lakunu sankh yawa (harshal gibs, 36) saha wegawathma shathakaya (eebi di wiliyars, pandu 31) dakiya haka).
